settings.heading: Policy
settings.subtext:
We offer a 30-day return policy on all products, giving you peace of mind when shopping with us. Additionally, all devices are covered by the LoopTech Guarantee – a full 1-year warranty against manufacturing defects. Unless otherwise specified.
